Package controller

Class PhotoViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoViewController
public class PhotoViewController
extends java.lang.Object
PhotoView Controller used to connect the PhotoView.fxml View to Models.
Author:
Naveenan Yogeswaran, Savan Patel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Admin admin
    Reference to Admin who has reference to all Users.
    (package private) Album album
    Reference to Album who has references to all of the selected Album's Photos.
    (package private) javafx.scene.text.Text caption
    Text box used to display photo caption.
    (package private) javafx.scene.text.Text date
    Text box used to display photo capture date.
    (package private) javafx.scene.image.ImageView photoDisplay
    Image View that is used to show the selected photo in the display area.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.ListView<Photo> photoListView
    List View that is used to show list of photos belonging to selected user and selected album.
    (package private) javafx.collections.ObservableList<Photo> photos
    ObservableList used to populate photoListView and to keep track of new changes.
    (package private) javafx.collections.ObservableList<Tag> photoTags
    ObservableList used to populated photoTagsListView and to keep track of new changes.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.ListView<Tag> photoTagsListView
    List View that is used to show list of tags belonging to displayed Photo.
    private static javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage
    Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> tagTypeChoice
    Combo Box used to display available tag types for user to pick from when adding new tag.
    (package private) javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> tagTypes
    ObservableList used to populate tagTypeChoice and to keep track of new changes.
    (package private) User user
    Reference to User who has reference to all of the selected User's Albums.

      List View that is used to show list of tags belonging to displayed Photo.

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, Album selectedAlbum, User selectedUser)

      selectedAlbum - Reference to the selected Album
      selectedUser - Reference to the selected User

    • showItem

      public void showItem​(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage)

      Parameters:

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Adds new Photo to Album using a TextInputDialog Box to take in the location of the Photo. If file does not exist, an Alert is given to the User.
      Parameters:
      e - Reference to ActionEvent

    • deletePhoto

      public void deletePhoto​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Deletes the selected Photo and all associated Tags.
      Parameters:
      e - Reference to ActionEvent

    • deleteConfirmation

      public boolean deleteConfirmation​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content)
      Asks User to confirm Deletion of Photo.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.
      title - Title of the Alert dialog.
      content - Brief description of item to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if User confirms action; False if User cancels action
